Function Documentation

void _PWM_CH_Init ( HT_TM_TypeDef *  TMx,
TM_CH_Enum  TM_CH_n,
TM_OutputInitTypeDef *  OutInit 
)

Init PWM Channel.

Parameters:
TMx,:where TMx is the selected TM from the TM peripheral.
TM_CH_n,:Specify the TM channel.
OutInit,:Point to a TM_OutputInitTypeDef structure
Return values:
None

void PWM_Cmd ( ControlStatus  NewState)
